# gghic

**gghic** is a powerful and flexible R package for visualizing 3D genome
organization from Hi-C and multi-way contact data. Built on `ggplot2`,
it provides publication-ready visualizations with minimal code while
maintaining full customization capabilities.

## Features

- üé® **Intuitive API** - Simple high-level functions with sensible
  defaults
- üß¨ **Comprehensive** - Visualize Hi-C heatmaps, TADs, loops, genes,
  and signal tracks
- üöÄ **Memory Efficient** - Focused data loading for large datasets
- üìä **Publication Ready** - Generate high-quality figures with minimal
  effort
- üîß **Customizable** - Full ggplot2 compatibility for advanced styling
- üß™ **Multi-way Contacts** - Native support for Pore-C and other
  multi-contact data

## Installation

### From GitHub

Install the development version using `devtools`:

``` r
if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) install.packages("BiocManager")
if (!require("devtools", quietly = TRUE)) install.packages("devtools")

# Install gghic
devtools::install_github("jasonwong-lab/gghic")
```

## Documentation

- [Get started with gghic for Hi-C/-like data
  visualization](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/articles/gghic.md)
- [Hi-C/-like data quality
  assessment](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/articles/depth.md)
- [Pore-C/-like multi-way contact
  analysis](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/articles/hypergraph.md)

## Getting Help

- üêõ **Bug Reports:** [GitHub
  Issues](https://github.com/jasonwong-lab/gghic/issues)
- üí° **Feature Requests:** [GitHub
  Discussions](https://github.com/jasonwong-lab/gghic/discussions)
- üìß **Contact:**
  - Open an issue for questions and support
  - Email <mjhk@connect.hku.hk> for direct inquiries

# Package index

## All functions

- [`ChromatinContacts-class`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/ChromatinContacts-class.md)
  : ChromatinContacts S4 class
- [`ChromatinContacts()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/ChromatinContacts.md)
  : Create a ChromatinContacts object
- [`as_tibble(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/as_tibble-ChromatinContacts-method.md)
  : Convert ChromatinContacts to tibble
- [`buildHypergraph()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/buildHypergraph.md)
  : Build Hypergraph from Multi-way Contacts
- [`concatemers2Gis()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/concatemers2gis.md)
  : Convert concatemer reads to pairwise interactions
- [`features(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<character>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/features-ChromatinContacts-character-method.md)
  : Get specific genomic features from ChromatinContacts object
- [`` `features<-`( ``*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<character>`*`,`*`<GRanges>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/features-set.md)
  [`` `features<-`( ``*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<character>`*`,`*`<GInteractions>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/features-set.md)
  [`` `features<-`( ``*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<character>`*`,`*`<GRangesList>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/features-set.md)
  [`` `features<-`( ``*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<character>`*`,`*`<list>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/features-set.md)
  : Set genomic features in ChromatinContacts object
- [`features(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<missing>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/features.md)
  : Get all genomic features from ChromatinContacts object
- [`focus(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/focus-ChromatinContacts-method.md)
  : Get focus regions of ChromatinContacts object
- [`geom_annotation()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_annotation.md)
  : geom_annotation
- [`geom_concatemer()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_concatemer.md)
  : geom_concatemer
- [`geom_concatemer2()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_concatemer2.md)
  : geom_concatemer2
- [`geom_hic()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_hic.md)
  : geom_hic
- [`geom_hic_under()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_hic_under.md)
  : geom_hic_under
- [`geom_hypergraph()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_hypergraph.md)
  : Visualize Multi-way Contacts as Hypergraph
- [`geom_ideogram()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_ideogram.md)
  : geom_ideogram
- [`geom_loop()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_loop.md)
  : geom_loop
- [`geom_loop2()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_loop2.md)
  : geom_loop2
- [`geom_tad()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_tad.md)
  : geom_tad
- [`geom_tad2()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_tad2.md)
  : geom_tad2
- [`geom_track()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_track.md)
  : geom_track
- [`geom_track2()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/geom_track2.md)
  : geom_track2
- [`getBreaksLabels()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/getBreaksLabels.md)
  : Generate axis breaks and labels for multi-chromosome plots
- [`gghic(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/gghic.md)
  [`gghic(`*`<data.frame>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/gghic.md)
  [`gghic(`*`<GInteractions>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/gghic.md)
  : Create Hi-C visualization plot
- [`import(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/import-ChromatinContacts.md)
  : Import chromatin contact data
- [`interactions(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/interactions-ChromatinContacts-method.md)
  : Get interaction data from ChromatinContacts object
- [`plotCoverageCurve()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/plotCoverageCurve.md)
  : Plot Coverage Fraction by Resolution
- [`plotHypergraph()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/plotHypergraph.md)
  : Plot Hypergraph Visualization
- [`plotResolutionCoverage()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/plotResolutionCoverage.md)
  : Plot Resolution vs Coverage
- [`print(`*`<hypergraph>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/print.hypergraph.md)
  : Print method for hypergraph objects
- [`resolution(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/resolution-ChromatinContacts-method.md)
  : Get resolution of ChromatinContacts object
- [`calculateResolutionDepth()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/resolution-depth.md)
  [`calculateGenomeCoverage()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/resolution-depth.md)
  [`findOptimalResolution()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/resolution-depth.md)
  [`readPairsCache()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/resolution-depth.md)
  [`calcResDepthChunked()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/resolution-depth.md)
  [`calcGenomeCovChunked()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/resolution-depth.md)
  [`findOptResChunked()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/resolution-depth.md)
  : Calculate Resolution and Depth for Pairs Data
- [`scaleData()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/scaleData.md)
  : Scale Hi-C interaction data
- [`seqinfo(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/seqinfo-ChromatinContacts-method.md)
  : Get sequence information from ChromatinContacts object
- [`subsetByOverlaps(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<numeric>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/subset-methods.md)
  [`subsetByOverlaps(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<logical>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/subset-methods.md)
  [`subsetByOverlaps(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<GRanges>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/subset-methods.md)
  [`subsetByOverlaps(`*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<GInteractions>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/subset-methods.md)
  [`` `[`( ``*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<numeric>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/subset-methods.md)
  [`` `[`( ``*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<logical>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/subset-methods.md)
  [`` `[`( ``*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<GRanges>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/subset-methods.md)
  [`` `[`( ``*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<GInteractions>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/subset-methods.md)
  [`` `[`( ``*`<ChromatinContacts>`*`,`*`<character>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/subset-methods.md)
  : Subset ChromatinContacts objects
- [`theme_hic()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/theme_hic.md)
  : theme_hic
- [`tidyHypergraph()`](https://jasonwong-lab.github.io/gghic/reference/tidyHypergraph.md)
  : Convert Hypergraph to Long Format for Visualization
